revised_title: Etruscan Inscription and Coin Analysis by John Swinton
tldr: The author, John Swinton, examines an ancient coin with an Etruscan inscription and provides a detailed analysis of its historical and linguistic significance. He deciphers the inscription and offers insights into the Etruscan language, its relation to Samnite and Latin languages, and the role of the Etruscan script in ancient Italy.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
